message: I know dropbox had a lot of success by putting together a video of their idea. I created a demo page, do you think this is as effective? http://oim.ae/chatdemo
I think auto typing some text into the boxes would make the demo more engaging

thats a good idea. Currently you can just type stuff in and press ok, but i guess i can make it just act out the idea instead of having people try it themselves, then can see it work for themselves. Thanks!
Demo in a Video at least (less script more features, fast pace editing...)
seems like it would be a great tool as part of learning a new language
thanks. we were thinking that too :)
Video, with a demo inside it - show a couple of your great features. Let people discover the other great ones when they start using your product
i agree, since the demo is usually the harder part, creating a simple example usage video should be easy (relatively) to do at this point
I saw a video on HackerNews that I thought was pretty good, mostly because it kept moving at a fast pace, and gave a full tour in about a minute and a half.  http://emotely.com/
I like it. I would like to have an option to see more examples than the one shown, different languages and applications of the product.
Sign up for the beta. :) There are only a few features that it currently supports from the feature list, but a working beta version does exist.
I signed up last night. It currently says your request has been accepted, we will email you when you have been approved.
Great! we are working on a couple of bugs. As soon as these are done, we will send you the accept. This should be sometime very soon.
